title: Geography Item
description: A single geography identifier used across schemas. Accepts 'Global', ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country codes (e.g., 'US', 'DE'), or free-text region names (e.g., 'Europe', 'North America'). Any 2-letter items in the array will be treated as an ISO code. Any 2-letter entries that do not map to a country will throw errors (EU). Do not use full country names, only ISO alpha-2 codes. To avoid typographical errors, items may not be 3 letters long (USA)
